title: Add Google Site Verification Meta Tag

requirements.text: Add the Google site verification meta tag '<meta name="google-site-verification" content="BDqzMIYR_Iw59Cw7LJqSVoMEfTtuBlNF0hxcBC7095w" />' to the <head> section of frontend/index.html, positioning it before the first <body> section

quotes: paste it into your site's home page. It should go in the <head> section, before the first <body> section :  <meta name="google-site-verification" content="BDqzMIYR_Iw59Cw7LJqSVoMEfTtuBlNF0hxcBC7095w" />

acceptanceCriteria: The Google site verification meta tag is present in frontend/index.html
The meta tag is placed within the <head> section
The meta tag appears before the opening <body> tag
The verification content value matches exactly: BDqzMIYR_Iw59Cw7LJqSVoMEfTtuBlNF0hxcBC7095w

constraints: Do not modify any existing meta tags or head content
Preserve all existing SEO meta tags and Open Graph tags
Maintain the exact verification content string provided by the user
nonGoals: Modifying any other HTML files beyond index.html
